thread.section_title: Blurb Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blurb | www.blurb.com
thread.title: Rhonda

author: Rhonda
title: Rhonda
text:
I created a book of my boyfriends poetry combined with my photos- the end result was a beautiful gift I presented to him on our anniversary .
The application was easy to install on my computer and easy to use! The process of copying and editing his poetry was time consuming and I spent approximately a month creating the book. When it was time to upload it and create the book I was worried it wouldn't work or that I might have done something wrong - but it was so easy and the end result was perfect !
